name: THE MOROCCAN CASTLE
description:
Hello 

You are in an Old Moroccan Castle Built in 1951 Placed In North Of Morocco ( Tetouan )

You Go To Get The Old Moroccan Art and old Moroccan Culture 

But You Find Yourself Without a Way Out From There You should Find a Way Out from Here Before 4:00AM Or You Will Die 

You Should Use your Brain To complete The Puzzles and Find The Keys 

Hope You Enjoy this Game

THIS GAME MADE BY ONE DEVELOPER
